title: Get subscription details of a developer app

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. You can find the App ID by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer application. You can find the Secret by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: subscribe_entity
parameters.description: The object that you want to subscribe to. Enum values: AD_ACCOUNT_SUSPENSION : the suspension statuses of ad accounts. LEAD : leads. AD_GROUP : the review status of an ad group. AD : the review status of an ad. TCM_SPARK_ADS : the status of Spark Ads authorization for a video uploaded to a TCM Workflow 2.0 order. TCM_VIDEOS : the linking of a TikTok video to a TTO campaign. CREATIVE_FATIGUE : the fatigue status of an ad, ads within an ad group, or ads within an advertiser account.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current page number. Default value: 1 . Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size. Default value: 10 . Value range: 1-1000

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The unique ID of the request.

fields.name: subscribe_entity
fields.description: The object that you want to subscribe to. Enum values: AD_ACCOUNT_SUSPENSION : the suspension statuses of ad accounts. LEAD : leads. AD_GROUP : the review status of an ad group. AD : the review status of an ad. TCM_SPARK_ADS : the status of Spark Ads authorization for a video uploaded to a TCM Workflow 2.0 order. TCM_VIDEOS : the linking of a TikTok video to a TTO campaign. CREATIVE_FATIGUE : the fatigue status of an ad, ads within an ad group, or ads within an advertiser account.

fields.name: bc_id
fields.description: When subscribe_entity is AD_ACCOUNT_SUSPENSION , either bc_id or advertiser_ids is returned. Business Center ID. You are subscribed to the suspension statuses of all ad accounts owned by the Business Center.

fields.name: advertiser_ids
fields.description: When subscribe_entity is AD_ACCOUNT_SUSPENSION , either bc_id or advertiser_ids is returned. A list of advertiser IDs. You are subscribed to the suspension statuses of these ad accounts, which can be owned by different Business Centers.

fields.name: lead_source
fields.description: Returned only when subscribe_entity is LEAD . The source of the leads to subscribe to. Enum values: INSTANT_FORM : leads generated through Instant Forms. DIRECT_MESSAGE : leads generated from direct messages of the associated Business Account.

fields.name: page_id
fields.description: The ID of the Instant Form that you want to subscribe to. Note : When lead_source is DIRECT_MESSAGE , this field will be null.

fields.name: tcm_account_id
fields.description: Returned only when subscribe_entity is TCM_SPARK_ADS . TikTok Creator Marketplace account ID.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Returned only when subscribe_entity is TCM_SPARK_ADS . The ID of the video that is uploaded to a TCM Workflow 2.0 order.

fields.name: tto_tcm_account_id
fields.description: Returned only when subscribe_entity is TCM_VIDEOS . The ID of a TTO Creator Marketplace account.
